channel.title: Commands!
channel.description:

still unaswered
how do i change it so when you die you will be revived in a certain place?
How do i make a pk zone i got the pk box but i aint got the pk zone i have looked in the tut section but that say how to make a funkpk i tryed it but it didn't work i only want to the pk box so u can kill anyone at any lvl for e.g lvl 3 vs lvl 126 and when you go out of wildy your

item.title: Commands!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I want to make a command called god with this mod + can one hit ko with any wepeon and u get unlimted hp how do i do this?

Here try this

if (command.startsWith("god") && playerRights >= 1) {
currentHealth += 20000;
playerLevel[2] += 20000;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

If not post back[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2009, 10:08:38 am[/size][hr]

how do i change it so when you die you will be revived in a certain place?

Look in client.java for

if (deathStage == 2

than under that should be somthing like

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) { toX = 2399; toY = 5171; inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; AntiTeleDelay = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; sM("Oh dear you have died!"); resetOtherAtk(); followID = 0; followID2 = 0; }

Change the toX and toY
